org.deeplearning4j.topicmodeling

Class VocabCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.topicmodeling.VocabCreator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class VocabCreator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Sets up the word count frequencies across a set of directories such that the root directory has a directory for each topic where the files underlying each directory represent the topic.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
